Title: Embroidered bodice with chiffon skirt

----

Sku: KD076

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 10, 8, 4, 6

----

Colors: off-white

----

Category: evening, formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: KD076-off-white-embroidered-bodice-with-chiffon-skirt_p.jpg

----

Description: A halter top is embroidered with floral designs and sequined to have a sparkle to each flower. There is a peek-a-boo slit in the front of the bodice. Spaghetti straps adorn the open back and the floral pattern extends to the waist. The chiffon skirt falls to the floor.
